name_definition.note: The name is the component name. It must be lowercased.

version_definition.native_name: full package version, including version and revision
version_definition.note: The version is the full Bitnami package version, including version and revision.

qualifiers_definition.description: The arch is the qualifiers key for a package architecture. Available values are amd64 (default) and arm64.
The distro is the qualifiers key for the distribution associated to the package.
